headline: UBS Raises AppLovin Corporation (APP)’s Price Target To $810, Maintains Buy Rating
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is among the 10 Best Money Making Stocks to Invest In. On September 26, UBS hiked the stock’s price target to $810 from $540, while maintaining a Buy rating for its shares. Analyst Chris Kuntarich noted that the company was on track to execute key initiatives over the next 12 months, which […]

headline: Biggest Winners To Close Out Q3
summary: The large-cap Russell 1,000 is set to close out Q3 with a gain of roughly 7%, but the average stock in the index is up much less than that at 4%.

headline: Q3 wrap-up: Top stock performers & 2 reasons for a bullish Q4
summary: AppLovin (APP), Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD), Western Digital (WDC), and Intel (INTC) were some of the top-performing stocks in the third quarter of 2025. Looking ahead to the fourth quarter, Hennion & Walsh chief investment officer Kevin Mahn says two factors are driving his expectations for a fruitful final quarter. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: Wurl’s New CTV Study Shows Strong Growth in Free Streaming Channel Audiences and Expanding Opportunities for Advertisers
summary: PALO ALTO, Calif., September 30, 2025--Wurl, a leader in the streaming TV industry, today released an iteration of The CTV Trends Report – a collection of data-driven insights into the forces shaping the connected TV (CTV) industry. This edition offers marketers a detailed look at how adoption of free, ad-supported streaming channels is evolving, with more viewers tuning in, engaging longer with content, and creating new opportunities for advertisers.
